works.description: We have seen the floating luxury hotels and the floating islands, but the idea of a floating golf course seems truly exciting. Waterstudio.NL, Dutch Docklands and Troon Golf have unveiled plans to build the world’s first floating golf course in the Maldives. Just five minutes from the Maldives airport, the golf course will be solar powered, and will include luxurious accommodations with breathtaking views of the greens and the surrounding reefs. The 18-hole golf course will be built on floating platforms, which makes it the world’s first floating golf course.
